definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: a city or district under Assyr. control, whither Isr. captives were taken 2Ki 17:6 = 2Ki 18:11, 1Ch 5:26, cf. Ḫalaḫḫu in Mesopotamia, Schr:COT on 2Ki 17:8; > Hal:Mêl. Epigr. 1874, 70 Cilica (= Ph. [[חלך]], Lag:M. i. 211, As. Ḫilakku, Lyon:Sargontexte) Lag:BN 57.
